name: Seashore Rendez-vous alpha 0.1
description:
Story:

"Seashore Rendez-vous" is a highly story-oriented visual novel where a trip to the seashore turns into something exciting.

Choose the visit to the beach on both occasions to test the gameplay.

Credits:

Story and art - Bartek Biedrzycki

Additional character art - Zuza Biedrzycka

Music - TipTopTomCat

Releases:

2022-03-16 - alpha 0.1 - first playable segment to demo the concept.
